keyPolicies.policyDescription: A cross-Party group which did just that.

mentions.candidate: Julian has served as MP for New Forest East since the seat was created in 1997.

issues.brexitEurope: Julian has always supported keeping the Pound and our Trident nuclear deterrent, and maintaining our sovereign Defence and Foreign Policy against Europe's creeping federalism.
issues.environment: Backing new moves for a part of Dibden Bay.
issues.governance: Fighting to keep local decisions local, e.g., preventing undue interference by the National Park Authority.
issues.socialWelfare: Fighting to keep local awards for the vulnerable mentally ill.

leaflet.personalStatement: Julian was Royal Naval Reserve Lieutenant, Julien recruits Armed Forces from Southampton University ROTC, and he is a Defence Specialist by profession as well as conviction.

quotes.text: Backling local efforts, together with Green and other activists, to stop compulsory fluoridation of our water in Totton.

images.caption: Picture of Julian Lewis with two individuals.

leaflet.additionalNotes: All his many speeches and questions in the House of Commons can be found on his website www.julianlewis.net. He needs your help with campaigning.
